workshop.controllers

Class WorkshopControllerAbstract

  • java.lang.Object
    • workshop.controllers.WorkshopControllerAbstract
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorkshopController
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IndexController, UpperMenuController

    @Controller
 @SessionAttributes(names={"headerContentLanguageValue","language"})
public class WorkshopControllerAbstract
extends java.lang.Object
implements WorkshopController

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String headerContentLanguageValue
      The value of http header 'Content-Language' for currently supported languages to be passed into views for the language switcher.
      private java.lang.String langCookieName

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCurrentLanguage(org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Adds a currently selected language from user's cookie "lang' as a session attribute to be displayed instead of default.
      void addSupportedLanguages(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Adds a List of currently supported languages to the current session for html language selector to pick up from.

    • Field Detail

      • headerContentLanguageValue

        @Value(value="${supportedLanguages}")
private java.lang.String headerContentLanguageValue
        The value of http header 'Content-Language' for currently supported languages to be passed into views for the language switcher.

      • langCookieName

        @Value(value="${langCookieName}")
private java.lang.String langCookieName

    • Constructor Detail

      • WorkshopControllerAbstract

        public WorkshopControllerAbstract()

    • Method Detail

      • addSupportedLanguages

        @ModelAttribute(name="headerContentLanguageValue")
public void addSupportedLanguages(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Adds a List of currently supported languages to the current session for html language selector to pick up from. The languages list is obtained from 'workshop.properties' "headerContentLanguageValue=[lang1,lang2,...etc]

      • addCurrentLanguage

        @ModelAttribute(name="language")
public void addCurrentLanguage(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Adds a currently selected language from user's cookie "lang' as a session attribute to be displayed instead of default. If no cookie presented, 'RU" will be displayed as a default.
